sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[Name], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Lookup].[TargetGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.RequestId, r.SupportActivityID, r.Details, r.DueDate, r.IsHealthCritical, r.JobStatusID, r.VolunteerUserID , r.DueDateTypeId, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Job] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[Job], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.GroupID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.QuestionID, r.Answer, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[JobQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.JobID, CT.JobStatusID, CT.DateCreated, r.VolunteerUserID, r.CreatedByUserID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[RequestJobStatus] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[RequestJobStatus], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.JobID = CT.JobID and r.JobStatusID = CT.JobStatusID and r.DateCreated = CT.DateCreated where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ActivityID, CT.QuestionID, CT.RequestFormVariantID, r.[Order], r.[Required], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID  and r.RequestFormVariantID = CT.RequestFormVariantID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.[Name],r.QuestionType,r.AdditionalData , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[Question], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.FulfillableStatus, r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName,r.ReferringGroupId,r.Source,  r.Archive, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[Request], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.requestId, r.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[SupportActivities], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestID = CT.RequestID and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.PostalCode, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[ChampionPostcode] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[ChampionPostcode], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.PostalCode=CT.PostalCode where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.RegistrationStep, u.DateCompleted, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[RegistrationHistory] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[RegistrationHistory], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.RegistrationStep =CT.RegistrationStep where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[SupportActivity] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[SupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.ActivityID=CT.ActivityID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, u.ReferringGroupId,u.Source, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[User], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value:
SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS}
SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c 
where c._ts>1589372085
